name: us_ia
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool us_gas_prices.
Tool description: Simplest and most comprehensive API for average gas price data in the US.
API description: Returns current gas price data for Iowa. Historical data starting from 2023-06-01 can be queried by adding the `date` parameter to this endpoint. In order to return XML instead of the default JSON format, simply add the `Accept: application/xml` header to your request.

date.description: Specific date for querying historical data starting from 2023-06-01. Defaults to None.
